name: Trigon FRVR - Switch and Match the Color Spinner
name_original: Trigon FRVR - Switch and Match the Color Spinner
description:
Trigon FRVR - Switch and Match the Color Spinner is an arcade game developed by FRVR.
You can play Trigon FRVR - Switch and Match the Color Spinner on Android. You can purchase the game on Google Play.
